stories.Title: Ad-free experience with a twist
stories.Description: Meta has been struggling to adapt its platform to EU privacy regulations for quite some time. Their latest idea is a $14/month plan for users who want to keep their data away from targeted ads.
stories.Tweet: Ad-free experience with a twist 📦 Meta has been struggling to adapt its platform to EU privacy regulations for quite some time. Their latest idea is a $14/month plan for users who want to keep their data away from targeted ads. #meta https://www.cnbc.com/2023/10/03/meta-wants-to-charge-europeans-to-access-instagram-facebook-report-.html

stories.Title: Ready for tomorrow?
stories.Description: Google's "Made by Google" event is just around the corner. The leaks did their part, and the excitement is high. Check out what they will be announcing.

stories.Title: Twinkle, twinkle, satellite
stories.Description: That shining star you're looking at could simply be the BlueWalker 3 satellite. As commercial satellites grow larger and brighter, astronomers are concerned about potential challenges.
stories.Tweet: Twinkle, twinkle, satellite 📦 That shining star you're looking at could simply be the BlueWalker 3 satellite. As commercial satellites grow larger and brighter, astronomers are concerned about potential challenges. #rocketscience https://www.engadget.com/one-of-the-brightest-objects-in-the-night-sky-is-a-human-made-satellite-212617952.html

stories.Title: The focus shifts for some
stories.Description: Building a commercial space station is an incredible challenge. NASA's chosen companies hold promise. However, two of them are stepping away from the goal as the program evolves.
stories.Tweet: The focus shifts for some 📦 Building a commercial space station is an incredible challenge. NASA's chosen companies hold promise. However, two of them are stepping away from the goal as the program evolves. #rocketscience https://arstechnica.com/space/2023/10/northrop-grumman-likely-to-end-its-bid-for-a-commercial-space-station/

stories.Title: Unveiling solar mysteries
stories.Description: More discoveries are awaiting us with NASA’s recent announcement. The New Horizons mission, scheduled to end in 2024, has now been granted an extended timeline until 2028.
stories.Tweet: Unveiling solar mysteries 📦 More discoveries are awaiting us with NASA’s recent announcement. The New Horizons mission, scheduled to end in 2024, has now been granted an extended timeline until 2028. #rocketscience https://gizmodo.com/nasa-new-horizons-extended-mission-kuiper-belt-1850892636

stories.Title: Test done! Launch ahead!
stories.Description: The Psyche mission is ready to launch on October 12. A static fire test of the Falcon Heavy has been completed, and anticipation continues to grow for this joint endeavor between NASA and SpaceX.
stories.Tweet: Test done! Launch ahead! 📦 The Psyche mission is ready to launch on October 12. A static fire test of the Falcon Heavy has been completed, and anticipation continues to grow for this joint endeavor between NASA and SpaceX. #rocketscience https://www.space.com/spacex-falcon-heavy-static-fire-psyche-asteroid-mission

stories.Title: Innovation at work
stories.Description: AI has always been behind LinkedIn's magic, but now it's taking center stage. Explore the latest recruiting, learning, and marketing tools that are set to simplify the lives of professionals.

title: Meta's ad-free plan, Catch Google's event, Cybertruck from the inside
description: If you want to navigate smoothly without worrying about ads through Meta's social media platforms, there's a small price you can pay. Tomorrow is the big day—the "Made by Google" event lands in New York. Leaks can't hold back the excitement; don't miss it. And to continue my Cybertruck surveillance, here's an up-close view of the interior.
